text: Dinesh Khanna is a former Indian badminton player. ==Career== He was the Men's singles Asian Champion in 1965 and became the first Indian to win an Asian badminton title on 14 November 1965. He won a Bronze medal in the 1966 Commonwealth Games . He was Indian national badminton champion in 1966 and a recipient of Arjuna award in 1965. ==Achievements== === Asian Championships === Men's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
